title: Succulent meatloaf
ingredients: ['2 large onions, chopped', '2 large celery sticks, chopped', '1 large green pepper, deseeded and chopped', '3 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '900g (2 lb) lean minced beef', '50g (1 3/4 oz) fresh breadcrumbs', '1 egg white', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '4 tbsp no-salt-added tomato ketchup']
